thread.title: Kentucky tied for top spot in preseason coaches poll
thread.title_full: Kentucky tied for top spot in preseason coaches poll

title: Kentucky tied for top spot in preseason coaches poll
text:
Kentucky tied for top spot in preseason coaches poll 
Updated: Thu, Oct 15 2015, 02:09 PM 
CINCINNATI (WKRC) -- The University of Kentucky men's basketball team is ranked preseason No. 1 for the third straight year in the USA Today coaches poll, but the Wildcats are tied for the top spot with North Carolina. 
North Carolina garnered 12 of 32 possible first-place votes to 11 for Kentucky. 
The University of Cincinnati just missed landing in the top 25 and earned the 31st most points, while Xavier earned the 35th most points. 
Ohio State got two points. 
Indiana is ranked 15th in the poll. 
Here is the complete poll with first-place votes in parentheses. RK TEAM RECORD POINTS 1, Kentucky (11) 38-1 749 1, North Carolina (12) 26-12 7493, Maryland (5) 28-7 7234, Duke (3) 35-4 6865, Kansas (1) 27-9 6756, Virginia 30-4 6677, Iowa State 25-9 5418, Oklahoma 24-11 520
